# The `Use` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> represents the edge between a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> definition and its users. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> represents the edge between a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> definition and its users.

This is notionally a two-dimensional linked list. It supports traversing all of the uses for a particular value definition. It also supports jumping directly to the used value when we arrive from the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a>&#39;s operands, and jumping directly to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> when we arrive from the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>&#39;s uses.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/use-h">Use.h</a>.
